text: Jack and Jill went up the hill,To fetch a pail of water.
Jack fell down and broke this crown and Jill came tumbling after..
Then up jack and said to Jill as in his arms he took her
Blush up her dirt and your not hurt..
Lets fetch a pail of water
So jack and Jill went up the hill,To fetch a pail of water.
And took it home to mother dear who thanks to son and daugther
Up jack got and home did trot as fast he could caper...
To old dame dob, who patched his nob with vinegar and brown paper
Then Jill came in she did grin to see jack paper plastic..
Her mother vector cross knee lapping at jack disaster
